modName: Glass Armour in to Heavy Armour and Daedric Stat Glass Weapo
summary: Changes Glass Armour in to Heavy Armor with Daedric Stats And Weapons
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE Added Glass Weapons With Deadric Stats


This Is my very First Mod made for my wife. But I desided to upload it in case anybody else wanted to give it a try.

All this mod does is Changes the Glass armor in to Heavy Armour with Daedric Stats and is fully upgradeable to full daedric stats i did this cuz my Wife thought the Glass armor was the cooliest looking but wanted to keep useing heavy armour

Installation - Extract the file with your choice of file extractor and place the .esp file in to your DATA folder
author: CptKlink
